question: Recently, it was reported in media that the centre is planning to pass an amendment of the sixth schedule of the constitution to provide more powers to tribals of Mizoram. Apart from Mizoram, which of the following states are included in sixth schedule?
explanation: The four states included in the Sixth Schedule are: Assam, Meghalaya, Tripura and Mizoram. These states contain Tribal Areas which are technically different from the Scheduled Areas. Though these areas fall within the executive authority of the state, provision has been made for the creation of the District Councils and regional councils for the exercise of the certain legislative and judicial powers.  Each district is an autonomous district and Governor can modify/ divide the boundaries of the said Tribal areas by notification.
